resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MK Button D use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MK Button D use the bluetooth and location permission
MK Button D requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MK Button D cannot be used normally.
After that, MK Button D could search and connect with the MK Button D
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MK Button D use the Location permission
MK Button D requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, MK Button D cannot be used normally.
MK Button D requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MK Button D cannot be used normally.
Are you sure you want to quit?

* RSSI filtering is the highest priority filtering condition. BLE Name and MAC Address filtering must first meet the RSSI filtering condition.\n* There is an \"OR\" relationship between the BLE Name filtering and the MAC Address filtering.
*After device keep static for %ss, abnormal inactivity alarm will be triggered and start advertising for %ss.
*After device keep static for %ss, it will stop advertising and disable alarm mode to enter into power saving mode until device moves.

*Advertising mode mainly refers to the configuration of channel parameters for broadcasting in a non-connected state and the parameter settings related to alarm events, which are different from the parameters in long connection mode.

*Long connection mode mainly refers to the parameter settings related to alarm events and event monitoring display in a long connection state. To ensure the beacon can be connected, you need to make sure that at least one slot is enabled in Advertising Mode setting, allowing the device to continue broadcasting while in a non-connected state.
